v2.2.1.changelog: Fix a bunch of teething issues relating to v2.2.0. Also reintroduces prefix commands via bridging, meaning you can use slash and prefix commands!

v2.2.0.changelog:
Innovation! Mass dependency upgrades and movement to modern Discord features.

- Implemented guild storage, allowing one bot to properly serve multiple guilds
- Database caches to improve performance
- Replaced prefix commands with slash commands
- Fix various bugs in commands
- Various quote system improvements, including:
  - New schema which includes the date added and the user who added the quote
  - Ability to add quotes by right-clicking a message
  - Ability to search quotes by text content

v2.1.3.changelog: Fixed a bug where searching quotes past page one results in the quote list being offset by one.

v2.1.2.changelog:
Custom command arguments work properly now!

The parsing of custom command arguments is much better now, and should work properly for values separated by spaces or enclosed in quotations.

v2.1.1.changelog:
TBOsmiumLib has updated!

Enjoy more helper functions in custom commands and other minor optimizations.

See the new TBOL documentation here: https://github.com/AnonymousHacker1279/TitanBot/wiki/Custom-Commands#tbosmiumlib-documentation

v2.1.0.changelog:
Custom commands!

Expand TitanBot to fit your server with custom commands.
Additionally, some improvements and minor bugfixes have been included for other functions.

v2.1.0-indev.changelog:
Custom commands!

Expand TitanBot to fit your server with custom commands.

v2.0.0.changelog:
Full v2.0 release. Goodbye, legacy! We won't miss you!

What's new since the last indev release:
 - Added integration with the Genius music API for getting song lyrics.

v2.0.0-indev.changelog: In-dev build as part of the TitanBot v2.x rewrite.
